title: Raani Jhumka: Polki Diamond & Coral Heritage Earrings
materials: Cultured Pearls. Hyderabadi Gold Polish. The gold weight is around 15 grams.
features: The 'Raani Jhumka' showcases a traditional chandbali-inspired design featuring a floral stud and a captivating semi-circular pendant. A field of meticulously arranged coral beads forms the heart of the design, encircled by a halo of brilliant Polki diamonds. The design is completed with a fringe of pearl and coral drops. The back of the piece showcases intricate craftsmanship, a testament to the skilled artisans from Hyderabad.
occasions: and special celebrations. A stunning statement piece for a half-saree function or other traditional ceremonies.
description: A timeless heirloom piece combining the opulence of Polki diamonds with the vibrant energy of coral. This earring is a testament to Hyderabadi craftsmanship, offering a unique blend of tradition and elegance. Its intricate design and high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and value, making it a cherished addition to your jewelry collection.
